\x1b[32mTo create a module using the NestJS CLI, use the command:\x1b[0m
\x1b[94mnest g module \x1b[36m<module-name>\x1b[0m

\x1b[32mExample:\x1b[0m
\x1b[94mnest g module \x1b[36musers\x1b[0m

\x1b[32mYou can find the official NestJS documentation at:\x1b[0m
\x1b[94mhttps://docs.nestjs.com/\x1b[0m

\x1b[32mTo list all Docker volumes, use the command:\x1b[0m
\x1b[94mdocker volume ls\x1b[0m

\x1b[32mTo delete a Docker volume, use the command:\x1b[0m
\x1b[94mdocker volume rm \x1b[36m<volume-name>\x1b[0m

\x1b[32mExample:\x1b[0m
\x1b[94mdocker volume rm \x1b[36mmy-data-volume\x1b[0m
